origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAnalysisAPI.evaluate_crypto', 'description': 'This function evaluates the risk and return of a cryptocurrency based on its name, time frame for analysis, number of reports, historical data, current price, and risk management advice.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency, e.g., Litecoin.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for analysis, e.g., monthly, yearly.'}, {'name': 'reportCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of analysis reports to retrieve.'}, {'name': 'historicalData', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The duration of historical data to retrieve, e.g., 1 year.'}, {'name': 'currentPrice', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of current price to retrieve, e.g., real-time.'}, {'name': 'riskManagement', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include risk management advice.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'evaluation', 'description': 'The evaluation of the cryptocurrency including risk and return analysis.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAnalysisAPI.evaluate_crypto, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Litecoin', 'timeFrame'是'monthly', 'reportCount'是'5', 'historicalData'是'1 year', 'currentPrice'是'real-time', 'riskManagement'是'true'.

prediction:
To evaluate Litecoin's risk and return using the CryptoAnalysisAPI.evaluate_crypto function, you can call the API with the following parameters:

```
CryptoAnalysisAPI.evaluate_crypto(
    cryptoName='Litecoin',
    timeFrame='monthly',
    reportCount=5,
    historicalData='1 year',
    currentPrice='real-time',
    riskManagement=True
)
```

This will return an evaluation of Litecoin's risk and return based on the specified parameters. The evaluation will include risk and return analysis for the specified time frame, number of reports, and historical data. It will also provide risk management advice based on the user's preference.
